Title: The Passionate Friends
Writer: H.G. Wells (novel), Eric Ambler (screenplay), David Lean (adaptation), Stanley Haynes (adaptation)
Actors: Ann Todd, Claude Rains, Trevor Howard, Betty Ann Davies
Plot: The Passionate Friends were in love when young, but separated, and she married an older man. Then Mary Justin (Ann Todd) meets Steven Stratton (Trevor Howard) again and they have one last ...
